<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Fix script to update the reference qualifier on rm_story table.</description>
        <name>Fix reference qualifier for epic</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateRefQualForEpic();

function updateRefQualForEpic() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', 'rm_story');
	gr.addQuery('element', 'epic');
	gr.addQuery('reference_qual', 'CONTAINS', "'sys_idIN'+ScrumSecurityManager.getStoryDotEpic(current).join(',')");
	gr.query();
	
	if (gr.next()) {
		gs.log('Found old reference qualifier for epic on rm_story. Updating it...');
		gr.setValue('reference_qual', 'javascript:ScrumSecurityManager.getStoryDotEpic(current)');
		if (gr.update())
			gs.log('Updated reference qualifier for epic on rm_story');
		else
			gs.log('Updating reference qualifier for epic on rm_story failed');
	} else
		gs.log('Not attempting to replace reference qualifier since no record found matching the filter condition');
}]]></script>
